title: [Large-Scale] Strategies for Utilizing Mobile Learning in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and proficiency in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Mobile-integrated learning program for practicing nurses to enhance mathematical thinking application abilities

learning_goals: Learners apply data analysis skills required for nursing practice using mobile learning tools
Learners enhance mathematical problem-solving abilities through collaborative tasks in m-learning environments
Learners evaluate various mobile learning platforms (apps, LMS, etc.) to select tools aligned with their learning styles
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
